pages.title: Aardwolf
pages.text: The aardwolf ($(o)Proteles cristata$()) is an insectivorous mammal, native to East and Southern Africa.$(br2)Its name means "earth-wolf" in Afrikaans and Dutch.$(br2)The aardwolf is in the same family as the hyena.$(br2)Unlike many of its relatives in the order Carnivora, the aardwolf does not hunt large animals.
